page.title: 15MANOR FARM BRATTLEBY CONT.
page.content: The best barley goes to be made into beer and the rest is used to feed the animals. The rape is used for cooking oil and margarine. In the woods there are beech, oak and fir trees and and there are a number of rabbits. Mr. Marris has removed some hedges but he does not like to because he enjoys the birds and wild life that nests in the hedges. He found some badgers sets and a conservation group brought some badgers but they ran away. Mr. Marris poisons the rats because they bring diseases to the farm animals. He also had ten ducks but a fox killed eight of them and only took one away to eat. So Mr. Marris has only two ducks now.
